Drop screenshots/GIFs here to show up in the main README.

Suggested filenames (match README links):
- overview.png            # App overview (three columns)
- studies.png             # Studies table with pagination
- locations.gif           # Demo: click Locations row â†’ Viewer crosshair jumps
- terms-related.png       # Terms panel with Related terms + operators
- viewer.png              # NIfTI Viewer controls and slices

These files will be served at:
- /static/readme/overview.png
- /static/readme/studies.png
- /static/readme/locations.gif
- /static/readme/terms-related.png
- /static/readme/viewer.png
